mapper.select: select search_id,search_name,search_time from task_search where search_open_id=#{open_id} order by search_time asc

select t.`id`,t.`recruiting_number`,t.`release_time`,t.`traffic`,t.`task_title`, c.`class_id`,c.`describe`,c.`Picture`,c.`name`,u.user_name,u.user_id,u.open_id,t.task_description,tag.tag_id,tag.tag_name from justyou.task `t`,justyou.task_classification `c`, `user` u , task_set_tag tst,tag tag where t.class_id=c.class_id and u.user_id=t.user_id and t.id=tst.task_id and tst.tag_id=tag.tag_id and t.state=0 and start_time < DATE_SUB(now(),interval 60 second) and (t.task_title like #{pattern} or t.task_description like #{pattern} or t.id in (select id from task t,task_classification tc where t.class_id=tc.class_id and tc.name like #{pattern}) or t.id in (select t.id from task t,task_set_tag tst,tag tag where t.id=tst.task_id and tst.tag_id=tag.tag_id and tag.tag_name like #{pattern}))
select tag_id,tag_name,tag_count from tag where tag_state=0 order by tag_count DESC LIMIT 0,10
